name: monumentality
title: Monumentality
trigger_description: Own Cothon, Hippodrome and Alexandrian Library monuments at Tier 3.
description: +2 Movement for all Builders and Settlers. May purchase civilian units with Faith... Oh woops, wrong game.

name: pax_deiorum
title: Pax Deorum
trigger_description: As Hellenic never convert a pagan province and own at least one province of each pagan religion.
trigger_description_long: As Hellenic, never convert a heretical province and control at least one province of each of the following religions: Totemist, Norse, Nahuatl, Mayan, Inti, Fetishist, Animist, Tengri

fail_conditions.text: Has converted any §YPagan§! province after converting to §YHellenic§! religion.

success_conditions.text: Owns or subject owns a §YTotemist§! province.
Owns or subject owns a §YNorse§! province.
Owns or subject owns a §YNahuatl§! province.
Owns or subject owns a §YMayan§! province.
Owns or subject owns a §YInti§! province.
Owns or subject owns a §YFetishist§! province.
Owns or subject owns an §YAnimist§! province.
Owns or subject owns a §YTengri§! province.
success_conditions.text_old: Owns, subject owns or subject of our subject owns a §YTengri§! province.

name: legion_of_couriers
title: A Legion of Couriers
trigger_description: Construct all highways and have every highway province in a fort's zone of control.
description: Elysian Stranding, developed by Scurek Productions.

success_conditions.text: Has constructed the entire §YElysian Highway§! network.
Every province with a highway is in a fort's zone of control and owned by §Y[Root.GetName]§!, their subject or a subject of their subject.

name: to_make_pytheas_proud
title: To Make Pytheas Proud
trigger_description: Be the first to circumnavigate the globe and explore every sea tile, all before 1600.
description: Who is this Magellan you speak of?

fail_conditions.text: It is the §Y1st of January 1600§! and we have NOT yet completed the achievement's objective.
We were NOT the first to circumnavigate the globe.

name: just_a_little_exarchise
title: Just a Little Exarchise
trigger_description: Create and have all Exarchates with full territory and less than 50% liberty desire.

name: 100_years_away_from_home
title: 100 Years Away from Home
description: The 'Any % Speedrun' for true Elysian Gamers.

fail_conditions.text: It is the §Y1st of January 1545§! and we have NOT yet completed the achievement's objective.

success_conditions.text: Does NOT have the §YRoman Flight§! modifier.

name: autokrator
title: Autokrator
trigger_description: Reduce the autonomy in the lands of the Roman Empire without ever releasing Exarchates.

fail_conditions.text: Has created one of the following exarchs: §Y[ELG.GetName]§!, §Y[EEN.GetName]§!, §Y[EEA.GetName]§!, §Y[EEO.GetName]§!, §Y[EEE.GetName]§!, §Y[EEF.GetName]§!, §Y[EEH.GetName]§!, §Y[EEK.GetName]§!, §Y[EEG.GetName]§!, §Y[EER.GetName]§!, §Y[EEY.GetName]§!, §Y[EED.GetName]§!, §Y[EEI.GetName]§!, §Y[EET.GetName]§!, §Y[EEU.GetName]§!, §Y[EEB.GetName]§!.

success_conditions.text: Has reconquered all of the provinces once owned by the Roman Empire, fully cored them and reduced their autonomy to its minimum value. The required provinces can be highlighted using §Y£icon_achievement£Autokrator Status§! decision, which can be enabled by pressing the toggle decision button on the achievement entry.

name: the_only_colonizer
title: The Only Colonizer
trigger_description: Lie to Portugal and then by 1570 have no Europeans present on Elysium.

fail_conditions.text: Did NOT deceive the §YPortuguese§! during the flight.
It is the §Y1st of January 1570§! and we have NOT yet completed the achievement's objective.

success_conditions.text: It is the §Y1st of January 1570§! and no country with §YWestern§! or §YEastern§! technology group owns any province on the continent of §YElysium§! unless they are our subject or a subject of our subject.

name: no_more_schisms
title: No More Schisms
trigger_description: As Elysian Orthodox ensure there are no provinces following any other Christian faith.
description: Deck the halls? How about deck the heretics?

success_conditions.text: There are no provinces following any §YChristian§! faith apart from §YElysian Orthodox§!.

name: post_finem
title: Post Finem
trigger_description: As the Exarch of Africa reform Carthage and conquer or occupy Rome.
trigger_description_old: As the Exarch of Africa reform Carthage, conquer [221.GetName], [125.GetName], [2986.GetName], [1247.GetName] and occupy [118.GetName].
description: "Rome fell to the Carthaginian armies in 146 BC, where it was dismantled... brick by brick. Italia fell into disarray, with many small principalities emerging from the rubble of the once-blossoming nation, and eventually uniting in a defensive alliance against the Punic threat across the sea..." oh wait wrong timeline.

success_conditions.text: Has formed §YCarthagean§! nation. §YCarthage§! can be formed by releasing and playing as the §YExarch of Aphrike§!, which is done via a influence diplomatic interaction.

name: cities_of_the_new_world_desire
title: Cities of the New World's Desire
trigger_description: Ensure Neo Konstantinoupolis reaches 45 development, while also holding 5 cities on Elysium with 30 development and 4 buildings, all before 1500.

name: veni_vidi_vici
title: Veni Vidi Vici
trigger_description: With abysmal supplies, finish A True Nation in January 1490 with 0 loans, <5% corruption and admin. burden.
trigger_description_long: With abysmal supplies, finish A True Nation in 1490 without any loans, less than 5% corruption and less than 5% administrative burden.
description: We came, we saw, we broke down society.

fail_conditions.text: It is the §Y1st of February 1490§! and we have NOT yet completed the achievement's objective.

name: re_restitutor_orbis
title: Re-Restitutor Orbis
trigger_description: Restore the borders of the Roman Empire at its greatest extent before the Age of Absolutism.
description: I own a Gladius for home defence since that’s what the founders of Rome intended. Four plebeians break into my home. "By Jove!" I replace my Toga with a Galea and grab my Pila and Gladius. I leave a golf ball-sized wound in the first man, he’s dead on the spot. Throw my other Pilum at the second man, miss him entirely because he is too far and nail the neighbour's dog. I have to resort to the Onager at the top of the stairs loaded with pots of Greek Fire, "Roma Invicta!" As the Greek Fire burns two men to a crisp, the roaring sound and out-of-control fire sucks up all the oxygen. Strap my Scutum to my arm and charge the last terrified plebeian. He bleeds out waiting for the guards to arrive since Gladius's wounds are impossible to stitch up. Ahh~ Just as the founders of Rome intended.

fail_conditions.text: We are in the §YAge of Absolutism§!.

success_conditions.text: Has reconquered all of the provinces once owned by the Roman Empire. The required provinces can be highlighted using §Y£icon_achievement£Re-Restitutor Orbis Status§! decision, which can be enabled by pressing the toggle decision button on the achievement entry.

name: byzantine_blitz
title: Byzantine Blitz
trigger_description: Complete the entire mission tree, except Capital of Innovation, before 1700.
description:
A glimpse of the future, new tactics from tech
New doctrine of stackwipe explored
As fast as speed 5, there's no time to pause
A glimpse of the future and the Byzantine Blitz is born

fail_conditions.text: It is the §Y1st of January 1700§! and we have NOT yet completed the achievement's objective.

success_conditions.text: Has completed every mission in the §Y[Root.GetAdjective]§! mission tree, except §YCapital of Innovation§!.
